members.name: Bristol University
members.adcopy: Bristol University is a prestigious institution known for its research excellence and vibrant campus life.

members.name: Cabot Circus Centre
members.adcopy: Cabot Circus is the heart of shopping and dining in Bristol, offering a wide range of stores and entertainment options.

members.name: Temple Meads Station
members.adcopy: Bristol Temple Meads is the main railway station serving Bristol, with historic architecture and excellent transport links.

members.name: Bristol Museum
members.adcopy: Bristol Museum houses a diverse collection of art and historical artifacts, showcasing Bristol's rich cultural heritage.

members.name: Clifton Bridge
members.adcopy: The Clifton Suspension Bridge is an iconic symbol of Bristol, offering stunning views and a testament to Victorian engineering.

members.name: Mrs. Potts
members.adcopy: Mrs. Potts Chocolate House is a charming caf√© known for its delicious homemade chocolates and delightful afternoon teas.

members.name: Nandos
members.adcopy: Nando's is famous for its peri-peri chicken and vibrant atmosphere, a favorite spot for casual dining in Bristol.
